feat.value: A lacuna of approximately 50 manuscript folios (100 pages) in codex MONB.GL follows. The next fragment of the work Some Kind of People Sift Dirt appears after a lacunae of approximately 11 folios (22 pages) in codex MONB.GF and is published in Coptic Scriptorium urn:cts:copticLit:shenoute.dirt.monbgf:41-51.
